sentences.en: Attn: If you are cashing out, please do not click the redemption button more than once.
sentences.cn: 注意: 如果你要求支付, 请不要点击赎回按钮一次以上.

sentences.en: Attn: PS students MUST fill in their email addresses provided by the School.
sentences.cn: 注意: 专上教育学院之学生必须填上由学校提供之电邮地址.

sentences.en: ATTN! 7 th Batch Preorder is the last batch pre - order which can sure reach before CNY ~!
sentences.cn: 敬请注意! 第7批预购为最后一批保证在农历新年前到货的预购~!
销售部，由C. 比格斯办理
